job_tasks.phrase: Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to building and enhancing AI models (LLMs) for specific applications.

job_tasks.phrase: This includes not only development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the software engineering activities involved in developing, maintaining, and improving applications.

job_tasks.phrase: creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process.
job_tasks.justification: This is a specific example of building a user-facing application/assistant.

job_tasks.phrase: Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer
job_tasks.justification: This involves testing and integrating advanced AI technologies, which falls under the modeling aspect.

job_tasks.phrase: providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the development of solutions and providing guidance on their integration and use within workflows.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures
job_tasks.justification: This refers to improving the performance and integration of AI solutions within an existing infrastructure, which is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction.
job_tasks.justification: This implies maintaining the operational aspects of the AI solutions to ensure service quality and user satisfaction.

job_tasks.phrase: Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the business goal of improving client support and boosting innovation capacity.

soft_skills.phrase: providing support and guidance for internal teams
troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets
significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity

classification.rationale: The job description explicitly mentions building and improving platforms using LLMs and integrating state-of-the-art AI technologies like GPT-4 Vision. It emphasizes developing user-facing applications and providing support for their use, aligning directly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
